business.name: BestHair
business.tagline: Gold Coast's Most Trusted Hairdresser - Quality You Can Count On

hero.title: #1 Rated Hairdresser in Gold Coast
hero.subtitle: Transform your look with Gold Coast's premier hairdresser team. Over 10 years of experience delivering stunning results and exceptional service.

services.title: Cuts & Styling
services.description: Expert cuts and styling tailored to your unique features. Our Gold Coast stylists stay current with the latest trends while creating timeless looks.

services.title: Colour & Highlights
services.description: Full colour, balayage, highlights and colour correction. We use premium products for vibrant, long-lasting results that protect your hair.

services.title: Treatments & Care
services.description: Revitalize damaged hair with our luxury treatments. Keratin smoothing, deep conditioning, and scalp therapy for healthy, beautiful hair.

services.title: Bridal & Events
services.description: Make your special day unforgettable. Bridal packages include trial sessions, day-of styling, and group bookings for the whole wedding party.

about.title: Why Gold Coast Chooses BestHair
about.description: Since 2016, BestHair has been Gold Coast's destination for exceptional hairdresser services. Our passionate team combines artistic vision with technical expertise to help you look and feel your absolute best. We believe great hair starts with understanding your lifestyle, preferences, and goals.
about.mission: Our mission is simple: deliver salon experiences that exceed expectations, using sustainable practices and premium products that are kind to your hair and the environment.

features.title: Licensed Professionals
features.desc: Fully qualified stylists with ongoing training

features.title: Premium Products
features.desc: We only use salon-quality, sustainable products

features.title: Hygiene Guaranteed
features.desc: Strict sanitization protocols for your safety

features.title: Free Consultations
features.desc: Every visit starts with understanding your needs

testimonials.name: Emma Richardson
testimonials.text: I've been coming to BestHair for 3 years and wouldn't go anywhere else. The team really listens and always delivers exactly what I'm looking for. Best hairdresser in Gold Coast!

testimonials.name: Sophie Chen
testimonials.text: Found my forever salon! The attention to detail is incredible, and the atmosphere is so relaxing. My colour has never looked better. Highly recommend to anyone in Gold Coast.

testimonials.name: Michael Torres
testimonials.text: Finally a barber-quality cut in a salon environment. Quick, professional, and they actually remember how I like my hair. Great value for the quality.

testimonials.name: Jessica Williams
testimonials.text: BestHair did my bridal hair and I couldn't have been happier. They made me feel so beautiful on my big day. The trial was thorough and the day-of service was flawless.

faq.a: We're open Tuesday to Saturday, 9am-6pm, with late nights on Thursday until 8pm. Closed Sunday and Monday.

faq.q: Do I need to book an appointment?
faq.a: We recommend booking in advance to secure your preferred time, but we do accept walk-ins when availability allows.
We exclusively use premium, salon-quality products that are gentle on your hair and the environment.
Yes! Free parking is available directly behind our salon, with additional street parking nearby.
